Title: Project Blue Tigris
Description: This Project aims at enabling users to control and interact with Windows without the need to touch the keyboard or the mouse, through a new user interface using gestures and voice commands. This project will utilize webcam and microphones connected to the computer when installed. This is our vision. It would be great if you join us.
HomeWiki:
*the start date has been pushed back to July 7th for personal reasons/
*this project is still an idea that is being shared with people. We need more people to share their interest in coding, blogging, testing, or even if you have a nice word you want to say go ahead :)

Description:-

This Project aims at enabling users to control and interact with Windows without the need to touch the keyboard or the mouse, through a new user interface using gestures and voice commands. This project will utilize webcam and microphones connected to the computer when installed. This is our vision. What's yours?

We are still starting up and we need more people like you who are interested to join us!
